info.title: Redback's Action Factory for Applications
info.description: This is a class for attaching all kind of actions and listeners to elements to be handled in the client side and communicate with the server.

method.name: setAction
method.description: Creates an application async action listener to the given item.

parameter.name: $item
parameter.description: The handler item to invoke the action.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The application's view name to load. If empty, get the application's default view. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The holder container for the content that will be loaded. It is a css selector for the context.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: A set of attributes to be passed to the view through the GET method.

parameter.name: $loading
parameter.description: If true, set the page loading indicator. It is false by default.

method.name: setDownloadAction
method.description: Creates an application async download action listener to the given item.

parameter.name: $item
parameter.description: The handler item to invoke the action.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The application's view name to load. If empty, get the application's default view. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: A set of attributes to be passed to the view through the GET method.

method.name: setAppAction
method.description: Creates an application action listener to the given item.

parameter.name: $item
parameter.description: The handler item to invoke the action.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The application's view name to load. If empty, get the application's default view. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The holder container for the content that will be loaded. For more information, see \ESS\Protocol\ApplicationProtocol.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: A set of attributes to be passed to the view. For more information, see \ESS\Protocol\ApplicationProtocol.

parameter.name: $loading
parameter.description: If true, set the page loading indicator. It is false by default.
